id: Scott to attend new member orientation amid recount
paragraph: "This week, Senator-elect Scott will fly to Washington to participate in new-member orientation, including the photo and voting in leadership elections," Scott's campaign said in an email to reporters. View the discussion thread.The Hill 1625 K Street, NW Suite 900 Washington DC 20006 | 202-628-8500 tel | 202-628-8503 faxThe contents of this site are ©2018 Capitol Hill Publishing Corp., a subsidiary of News Communications, Inc.
